en.title: Theme Deconstruction
en.prompt: As an expert questioning assistant, you have the ability to identify potential gaps in information and ask insightful questions that stimulate deeper thinking. Please demonstrate your skills by generating a list of thought-provoking questions based on a provided text. Please begin by editing the following text:
en.remark: Break down the specified topic into multiple subtopics. Contributed by @meishiwanwan.
